name: Oxtongue River-Ragged Falls Provincial Park
review: Stopped here for 1 hour and already felt in love with the place. Amazing sound of the waterfalls, the beauty and the strength of the water , and of course the charming and vibrant colors of the falls.... hope I could find better words to ...

name: Oxtongue River-Ragged Falls Provincial Park
review: üá®üá¶üëçüèªü•∂‚ùÑÔ∏è Awsome experience ... Short trail from Highway üõ£ 60 , 10 minutes walking for a unique experience !!!

name: Oxtongue River-Ragged Falls Provincial Park
review: Nice waterfall to visit. We went during fall too see the foliage. We were late as most of the leaves had already fallen. But the falls was good looking and had a nice time.

name: Oxtongue River-Ragged Falls Provincial Park
review:
This is a hike i recommend you do.  Its only 350 Meters in length but OMG well worth the hike.   Such a Gorgeous view of the water fall.
Go check this out its amazing.   The only flaw is that you have to pay for parking but 5.00 or so is not that expensive at all well worth it.

name: Oxtongue River-Ragged Falls Provincial Park
review:
Beautiful waterfall. Nice trail to get to the lookout - we went on a whim so weren't necessarily dressed for hiking but it wasn't too bad, we just didn't climb down the rocks.

Wardens there at the time putting up a sign were friendly. ...

name: Oxtongue River-Ragged Falls Provincial Park
review: Short hike in the summer, however make sure you pay to park. In the winter it's free but you have to park outside the park and hike in. There is a really cool island in the middle of the falls that is a really cool place to hang out at ...

name: Oxtongue River-Ragged Falls Provincial Park
review: Not a bad hike, 20 min from parking to falls but very hard to see the falls. If they can make a small clearing or lookout place, it would be much better.

name: Oxtongue River-Ragged Falls Provincial Park
review: Amazing park to be one with nature. Great trails for walking and to observe the ragged falls, both from the top and or bottom of the falls. Either way great experience.

name: Oxtongue River-Ragged Falls Provincial Park
review: Has nice views a bit challenging in some spots, some parts do not have a clear passage but its nice, i suggest not going when its wet though it gets pretty dangerous, but it was still nice.

name: Oxtongue River-Ragged Falls Provincial Park
review: For those who haven't, recommend paddling or kayaking to get here.  Beautiful scenery and quite a view from the bottom of the falls.

name: Oxtongue River-Ragged Falls Provincial Park
review: What an awesome place. Well worth checking out

name: Oxtongue River-Ragged Falls Provincial Park
review: I went there for kayaking and I must say that this was one of the best super calm and smooth kayaking. Ragged falls is breathtaking.

name: Oxtongue River-Ragged Falls Provincial Park
review: Great place to stop off. Short hike to the falls. Worth checking out

name: Oxtongue River-Ragged Falls Provincial Park
review: Amazing and very short hike to see spectacular waterfalls

name: Oxtongue River-Ragged Falls Provincial Park
review: Great spot to canoe up to and go for a swim. Hike up to the top as well

name: Oxtongue River-Ragged Falls Provincial Park
review: Great stop for a picnic. Use of the park is 5.25 for two hour pass.

name: Oxtongue River-Ragged Falls Provincial Park
review: Scenic but difficult to access. Can be dangerous, not safe for small kids near the falls.

name: Oxtongue River-Ragged Falls Provincial Park
review: Beautiful !!  You can pack a picnic and hang out as long as you'd like to !!  Out houses, seating and the scenery and rapids !!  Definitely a spot you should put on your list to make sure you visit !!

name: Oxtongue River-Ragged Falls Provincial Park
review: Short but beautiful hike. You can canoe or kayak up from Oxtongue lake to the bottom of the falls.

name: Oxtongue River-Ragged Falls Provincial Park
review: Spectacular view. Go upstream and you might be able to switch in water.

name: Oxtongue River-Ragged Falls Provincial Park
review: Waaaaay too many flies .. couldn't get past the parking meter! Got bitten all over real bad .. would've been great to enjoy the beautiful falls had it not been for the flies!

name: Oxtongue River-Ragged Falls Provincial Park
review: This is not in the park. But it's so beautiful! Just watch your step!

name: Oxtongue River-Ragged Falls Provincial Park
review: A beautiful, majestic waterfall on the Oxtongue River.  Located just off Hwy. 60 this is a must-see attraction when in the area.  Easily one of the most impressive waterfalls in cottage country, especially during the Spring thaw.  Wear ...

name: Oxtongue River-Ragged Falls Provincial Park
review: A beautiful spot closer to Huntsville not requiring a trek all the way into Algonquin.  If you walk in past the falls, there are some beautiful spots along the river.  We visit in the fall to see the colors.  Parking is free if you have a Park Pass, but you can pay at the machines if you don't.

name: Oxtongue River-Ragged Falls Provincial Park
review: Short hike with good view.

name: Oxtongue River-Ragged Falls Provincial Park
review: Was a really nice, short trail. Pretty and peaceful.

name: Oxtongue River-Ragged Falls Provincial Park
review: Get really close and you will be mesmerized by the power of water.

name: Oxtongue River-Ragged Falls Provincial Park
review: Great view , try an extra hike if you are comfortable and the view for the fall is waiting.

name: Oxtongue River-Ragged Falls Provincial Park
review: Romantic spot also very beautiful.

name: Oxtongue River-Ragged Falls Provincial Park
review: Excellent little park. Limited parking in the summer and fall months and closed in the winter. Though you can park across the street but watch for "no parking signs".

name: Oxtongue River-Ragged Falls Provincial Park
review: Amazing. Especially in the fall

name: Oxtongue River-Ragged Falls Provincial Park
review: Great hiking spot.

name: Oxtongue River-Ragged Falls Provincial Park
review:
Don‚Äôt stop at the falls. Keep walking and there is a longer trail along the river. Just beautiful.
I don‚Äôt see this trail on the map, and don‚Äôt know where it ends. You may need more than 2 hours.

name: Oxtongue River-Ragged Falls Provincial Park
review:
This is a great place with stunning scenery. Its beautiful, and quite popular in the summer months.
In the winter months it is just as beautiful with few people in the area. It would be better to snowshoe with walking poles - although we just walked around in our winter boots and snow gear.

name: Oxtongue River-Ragged Falls Provincial Park
review: If in area worth going to.

name: Oxtongue River-Ragged Falls Provincial Park
review: Super special place!!

name: Oxtongue River-Ragged Falls Provincial Park
review: Very cool spot

name: Oxtongue River-Ragged Falls Provincial Park
review: Nice and quiet.

name: Oxtongue River-Ragged Falls Provincial Park
review: Easy hike in and pretty falls. Very peaceful and not busy. Limited parking.

name: Oxtongue River-Ragged Falls Provincial Park
review: Absolutely beautiful and captivating, the rush of the waterfall and the calm of the bay are stunning balances of each other. Plan to come here again. One of my favorite spots in the Muskoka region.

name: Oxtongue River-Ragged Falls Provincial Park
review: Fairly short trail, truth the woods, with an amazing view at the falls. Lovely any time if year.

name: Oxtongue River-Ragged Falls Provincial Park
review: Had a wonderful day here

name: Oxtongue River-Ragged Falls Provincial Park
review: Beautiful waterfalls.  Park permits are required.  You can purchase permits at the park.  2 hour 4 hour and full day permits are available.

name: Oxtongue River-Ragged Falls Provincial Park
review:
This  a beautiful place to stop and take a 1-2 hour hike.
It is right outside the Algonquin Park border, so really easy to get to if you are in the Huntsville Area.
There is a reasonable amount of parking, but be sure you pay at the ...

name: Oxtongue River-Ragged Falls Provincial Park
review: best Oxtongue River - Ragged Falls Provincial Park

name: Oxtongue River-Ragged Falls Provincial Park
review: Beautiful place

name: Oxtongue River-Ragged Falls Provincial Park
review: This place needs garbage bins

name: Oxtongue River-Ragged Falls Provincial Park
review: A short hike to Rocky falls

name: Oxtongue River-Ragged Falls Provincial Park
review: It has a short trail and a beautiful waterfall at the end of the trail.  Well worth the short hike to view.

name: Oxtongue River-Ragged Falls Provincial Park
review: It's a short canoe ride to the falls, once you're there you will find it was well worth it. Takes about 45 minutes to an hour to canoe from oxtongue lake through oxtongue river until you get to the falls. Once there you can dock up the ...

name: Oxtongue River-Ragged Falls Provincial Park
review: Excellent place. You can actually walk up to the falls.

name: Oxtongue River-Ragged Falls Provincial Park
review: Beauty personified.

name: Oxtongue River-Ragged Falls Provincial Park
review: The place is gorgeous especially in the fall season where the leafs changes to golden yellow or brighy red colour. Worth going! It's a very easy trail.

name: Oxtongue River-Ragged Falls Provincial Park
review: Absolutely incredible view! So beautiful river.

name: Oxtongue River-Ragged Falls Provincial Park
review: Read the map, take the fork to the right to reach the viewing platform. Not too far. This is outside Algonquin Park so it's a separate provincial park fee.

name: Oxtongue River-Ragged Falls Provincial Park
review: One of my favorite places to go

name: Oxtongue River-Ragged Falls Provincial Park
review: Beautiful paddle by kayak up the river from Oxtongue Lake to Ragged Falls. A 'must experience' experience!

name: Oxtongue River-Ragged Falls Provincial Park
review: Absolutely stunning tidbit of nature, lots of rain this summer resulting in violent, boiling, roaring falls that gets your heart rate up just looking at it. Wish I could post video as the pictures don't do the falls justice.

name: Oxtongue River-Ragged Falls Provincial Park
review: Canoeing there from the Aquonquin Outfits  , very enjoy the time

name: Oxtongue River-Ragged Falls Provincial Park
review: Big and Beautiful waterfalls.  Great easy hike for whole family.  Adventurist  climbs up and down the falls at their own risk.

name: Oxtongue River-Ragged Falls Provincial Park
review: A few hours of paddling with a canoe/kayak from Highway 60 to the falls(or to the north side of Oxtongue Lake) in a relaxed pace. You can hike at the end, to the top of the Falls; good way to put kids to sleep at the end of the day ;)

name: Oxtongue River-Ragged Falls Provincial Park
review: Cool, powerful falls. Lots of great rocks to climb and view the falls. Found a great picnic spot too. Good spot with kids. However, the washrooms needed some TLC.

name: Oxtongue River-Ragged Falls Provincial Park
review: Beautiful spot. Bring your camera. Easy walk from parking

name: Oxtongue River-Ragged Falls Provincial Park
review: Beautiful trail

name: Oxtongue River-Ragged Falls Provincial Park
review: Falls were raging due to high water when I visited.   Much more impressive than I thought these falls would be!

name: Oxtongue River-Ragged Falls Provincial Park
review: Gorgeous waterfall a very short walk into the park. I can definitely agree with Ragged Falls' rating as one of the top 10 waterfalls in Ontario.

name: Oxtongue River-Ragged Falls Provincial Park
review: An excellent way to experience Algonquin Park on the water for day trippers.

name: Oxtongue River-Ragged Falls Provincial Park
review: Very scenic if you have a vehicle the can handle the trail

name: Oxtongue River-Ragged Falls Provincial Park
review: Nice place to see fall color

name: Oxtongue River-Ragged Falls Provincial Park
review: Beautiful

name: Oxtongue River-Ragged Falls Provincial Park
review: Enjoy the hike year after the year. Great place for whole family

review: Awesome short winter walk

name: Oxtongue River-Ragged Falls Provincial Park
review: Beautiful Falls!

name: Oxtongue River-Ragged Falls Provincial Park
review: We loved it because it was 7 am and there was nobody there.  The place was secluded and the scenery stunning.

name: Oxtongue River-Ragged Falls Provincial Park
review: Amazing view on the waterfall when you take the canoe upstream the oxtongue river.

name: Oxtongue River-Ragged Falls Provincial Park
review: Went in the winter, and it was beautiful.

name: Oxtongue River-Ragged Falls Provincial Park
review: Beautiful large and small waterfalls with a very short hike.
